name: Timezone Updater
description: This app downloads and updates a time zones to latest version on your device. This update should fix all known problems with time zones, such as incorrect time in Android and some applications.  Procedure: 1. Get superuser privileges (root). 2. Install BusyBox. 3. Check the connection to Internet. 4. Tap UPDATE button. 5. Restart your device.  Will be updated a time zones and ICU data. Before starting the update procedure is recommended to make backup of the Android system.  NOTICE: Forum: http://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=692805 Developer site: http://meefik.ru Donations: http://meefik.ru/donate/  ATTENTION! This program comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY.
